text: Yuraq Urqu (Quechua yuraq white, urqu mountain, "white mountain", also spelled Yuraccorcco) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru. It is situated in the Arequipa Region, Condesuyos Province, Salamanca District, and in the La Unión Province, Puyca District. Yuraq Urqu lies northeast of a lake named Tintarqucha (Tintarcocha).escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Condesuyos Province (Arequipa Region) == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Arequipa Region
title: Yuraq Urqu (Arequipa)
